table.name: CauHinhQuanLy
table.script: CREATE TABLE [CauHinhQuanLy] ( [ID] INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, [SuDungKiTuPhatSinhMaCuaHang] BIT NOT NULL, [TuDongPhatSinhMaHH] INT NOT NULL, [LichSuThayDoiHH] INT NOT NULL, [ThoiGianNhapButToan] INT NOT NULL, [XuatVuotTon] BIT NOT NULL, [NgayBatDau] INT NOT NULL, [NgayPhanChia] INT NOT NULL, [NgayGiuaKy] INT NOT NULL, [SoNgayDenHanPhaiTra] INT, [SoLeDonGia] INT NOT NULL, [SoLeThanhTien] INT NOT NULL, [SoLeSoLuong] INT NOT NULL, [SoLeTyLe] INT NOT NULL, [NumberFormat] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [FormatDonGia] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [FormatThanhTien] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [FormatTyLe] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [FormatSoLuong] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [XuatKhiChuaNhap] BIT NOT NULL, [MaHangHoaNoiBo] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiSTTMaNoiBoHH] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiMaKhuVuc] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiSTTKho] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiSTTQuay] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiMaNganh] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiSTTNhom] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiSTTPhanNhom] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiMaNCC] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiSTTKhachHang] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiMaTang] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiSTTGianHang] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiSTTPhieuNhap] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiSTTPhieuXuat] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiSTTKhuyenMai] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiSTTCTKhuyenMai] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiSTTHoaDon] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiMaKhachHang] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiSTTNgheNghiep] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiSTTHinhThucThanhToan] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiMaPhongBan] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiMaNV] INT NOT NULL, [ChieuDaiKyTuPhatSinhMa] INT NOT NULL, [ConfigFile] NVARCHAR(255), [LabelMatrixPath] NVARCHAR(255), [TemFileName] NVARCHAR(255), [DateFormatShort] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [DateFormatLong] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [DateTimeFormat] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [DateHourFormat] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [NguyenTe] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [CauHinhMaHH] INT NOT NULL, [KyTuPhatSinhMaVoucher] NVARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, [LoaiMaKhiTimKiem] INT NOT NULL, [DateFormatSQL] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [ColorFocus] NVARCHAR(50), [ColorLostFocus] NVARCHAR(50), [ColorKey] NVARCHAR(50), [DienGiai] NVARCHAR(255), [GiaTri2] NVARCHAR(255), [GiaDanhMuc] INT, [DongBoDanhMuc] INT, [DongBoSoLieu] INT, [ChietKhauCanhBao] NUMERIC (19, 2), [ChietKhauGioiHan] NUMERIC (19, 2), [DoanhSoDiem] INT, [DiemVoucher] INT, [XuLyPhuThu] INT, [Language] NVARCHAR(255), [Header] NVARCHAR(1000), [Footer] NVARCHAR(1000), [NapTienFoodCourtMin] NUMERIC (19, 2), [NapTienFoodCourtMax] NUMERIC (19, 2), [NapTienFoodCourtDefault] NUMERIC (19, 2), [SoNgayGiaHanFoodCourt] INT, [Icon] IMAGE );

table.name: CauHinhTyLe
table.script: CREATE TABLE [CauHinhTyLe] ( [ID] [int] NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, [TLCK1] [numeric](18, 2) NOT NULL DEFAULT(0), [TLCK2] [numeric](18, 2) NOT NULL DEFAULT(0) )

table.name: QuanLyCashBox
table.script: CREATE TABLE [QuanLyCashBox] ( [ID] NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, [QuayBan] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [CaBan] INT NOT NULL, [NVBan] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [NgayGioMo] DATETIME NOT NULL, [NgayGioDong] DATETIME, [TrangThai] BIT NOT NULL, [DaVanChuyen] BIT NOT NULL );

table.name: CTQuanLyCashBox
table.script: CREATE TABLE [CTQuanLyCashBox] ( [ID] NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [STT] SMALLINT NOT NULL, [LoaiGiaoDich] NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [ThoiGianThucHien] DATETIME, [TriGia] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, [DaVanChuyen] BIT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ([ID], [STT]) );

table.name: CaBan
table.script: INSERT INTO [CaBan] ([STT], [TenCaBan]) VALUES (1, 'Ca 1')
INSERT INTO [CaBan] ([STT], [TenCaBan]) VALUES (2, 'Ca 2')

table.name: NhanVien
table.script: CREATE TABLE [NhanVien] ( [MaNV] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, [TenNV] NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, [TenDangNhap] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [MatKhau] IMAGE NOT NULL, [MaNVTao] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [NgayTao] DATETIME NOT NULL, [MaNVCapNhat] NVARCHAR(20), [NgayCapNhat] DATETIME, [NgaySinh] DATETIME, [NgayVaoLam] DATETIME NOT NULL, [DiaChi] NVARCHAR(255), [DienThoai] NVARCHAR(255), [Email] NVARCHAR(255), [GhiChu] NVARCHAR(255), [TrangThai] INT NOT NULL, [NgayNghiViec] DATETIME, [STT] INT, [TenChucVu] NVARCHAR(255), [MaPhongBan] NVARCHAR(20), [LoaiNhanVien] INT, [MaGianHang] NVARCHAR(20), [HinhAnh] IMAGE, [SoThe] NVARCHAR(50), [MaCH] NVARCHAR(20) );

table.name: DM_TienTe
table.script: CREATE TABLE [DM_TienTe] ( [MaChu] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, [MaSo] NVARCHAR(20), [SoLe] INT, [TenNguyenTe] NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, [NoiSuDung] NVARCHAR(255) );

INSERT INTO [DM_TienTe] ([MaChu], [MaSo], [SoLe], [TenNguyenTe], [NoiSuDung]) VALUES ('AUD', '36', 2, 'Dollar Úc', 'Úc, Lãnh thổ châu Nam Cực thuộc Úc, Đảo Christmas, Quần đảo Cocos (Keeling), Quần đảo Heard và McDonald, Kiribati, Nauru, Đảo Norfolk, Tuvalu');

INSERT INTO [DM_TienTe] ([MaChu], [MaSo], [SoLe], [TenNguyenTe], [NoiSuDung]) VALUES ('VND', '704', 2, 'Đồng', 'Việt Nam')

table.name: CauHinhBanHang
table.script: CREATE TABLE [CauHinhBanHang] ( [ID] BIGINT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, [Ten] NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, [DienGiai] NVARCHAR(255), [GiaTri1] NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, [GiaTri2] NVARCHAR(255), [Nhom] NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );

table.name: ThueGianHang
table.script: CREATE TABLE [ThueGianHang] ( [MaThue] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, [MaKho] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [MaKhuVucBan] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [MaNCC] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [MaLoaiGianHang] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [SoHopDong] NVARCHAR(255), [TenGianHang] NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, [STT] INT NOT NULL, [NgayTao] DATETIME NOT NULL, [MaNVTao] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [NgayBanGiao] DATETIME, [NgayBDTraTien] DATETIME, [PTTienLai] NUMERIC (19, 2), [TrangThai] INT, [MaNVKetThuc] NVARCHAR(20), [NgayKetThuc] DATETIME, [LyDoKetThuc] NVARCHAR(255), [ChamDut] BIT, [HinhThucBan] INT );

table.name: CuaHang
table.script: CREATE TABLE [CuaHang] ( [MaCH] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, [MaKhuVuc] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [MaGoiNho] NVARCHAR(50), [TenCH] NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, [TenGiaoDich] NVARCHAR(255), [KyTuPhatSinhMa] NVARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, [DiaChi] NVARCHAR(255), [MST] NVARCHAR(255), [SoDienThoai] NVARCHAR(255), [MaNVTao] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [NgayTao] DATETIME NOT NULL, [MaNVCapNhat] NVARCHAR(20), [NgayCapNhat] DATETIME, [TrangThai] INT, [Email] NVARCHAR(255), [Fax] NVARCHAR(255), [LaCHTT] BIT );

table.name: HangHoa
table.script: CREATE TABLE [HangHoa] ( [MaHH] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, [MaNoiBo] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [MaNCC] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [MaNganh] NVARCHAR(20), [MaThue] NVARCHAR(20), [TenHH] NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, [MaNVTao] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [NgayTao] DATETIME NOT NULL, [MaNVCapNhat] NVARCHAR(20), [NgayCapNhat] DATETIME, [GhiChu] NVARCHAR(255), [TrangThai] INT, [LoaiHangHoa] INT, [DonViTinh] NVARCHAR(255), [CapDo] INT, [HienThiTrongDanhMuc] INT, [MaThuongHieu] NVARCHAR(20), [MaTang] NVARCHAR(20), [MaKhuVucBan] NVARCHAR(20), [STT] INT, [STTNoiBo] INT );

table.name: HangHoa_KhuVuc
table.script: CREATE TABLE [HangHoa_KhuVuc] ( [MaHH] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [MaKhuVuc] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [GiaBanSi] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, [GiaBanLe] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ([MaHH], [MaKhuVuc]) );

table.name: HinhThucThanhToan
table.script: CREATE TABLE [HinhThucThanhToan] ( [MaHinhThuc] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, [STT] INT, [MaNhomThanhToan] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [TenHinhThuc] NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, [MoTa] NVARCHAR(255), [MaThe] NVARCHAR(10), [MaNguyenTe] NVARCHAR(20), [TLFee] NUMERIC (19, 2), [TrangThai] INT NOT NULL, [MaNVTao] NVARCHAR(20), [NgayTao] DATETIME NOT NULL, [MaNVCapNhat] NVARCHAR(20), [NgayCapNhat] DATETIME, [DoUuTien] INT, [MaChu] NVARCHAR(20) );

table.name: ThuongHieu
table.script: CREATE TABLE [ThuongHieu] ( [MaThuongHieu] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, [MaGoiNho] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [TenThuongHieu] NVARCHAR(255), [MaKhuVucBan] NVARCHAR(20), [MaNVTao] NVARCHAR(20), [NgayTao] DATETIME, [MaNVCapNhat] NVARCHAR(20), [NgayCapNhat] DATETIME, [GhiChu] NVARCHAR(255), [STT] INT );

table.name: NganhHang
table.script: CREATE TABLE [NganhHang] ( [MaNganh] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, [MaGoiNho] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [MaKhuVucBan] NVARCHAR(20), [TenNganh] NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, [MoTa] NVARCHAR(255), [MaNVNhap] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [NgayTao] DATETIME NOT NULL, [MaNVCapNhat] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [NgayCapNhat] DATETIME NOT NULL, [GhiChu] NVARCHAR(255), [STT] INT );

table.name: QuayBan
table.script: CREATE TABLE [QuayBan] ( [MaQuay] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, [STT] INT NOT NULL, [MaKho] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [TenQuay] NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, [LoaiQuay] INT NOT NULL, [TenGiaoDich] NVARCHAR(255), [DiaChi] NVARCHAR(255), [DienThoai] NVARCHAR(255), [Fax] NVARCHAR(255), [Email] NVARCHAR(255), [TrangThai] INT NOT NULL, [MaNVTao] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [NgayTao] DATETIME NOT NULL, [MaNVCapNhat] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [NgayCapNhat] DATETIME NOT NULL, [IP] NVARCHAR(15), [GhiChu] NVARCHAR(255), [MatKhauAdmin] NVARCHAR(255), [MaGoiNho] NVARCHAR(20) );

table.name: TyGiaQuyDoiNGoaiTe
table.script: CREATE TABLE [TyGiaQuyDoiNGoaiTe] ( [Ngay] DATETIME NOT NULL, [MaChu] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [TyGia] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, [MaNVCapNhat] NVARCHAR(20), PRIMARY KEY ([Ngay], [MaChu]) );
INSERT INTO [TyGiaQuyDoiNGoaiTe] ([Ngay], [MaChu], [TyGia], [MaNVCapNhat]) VALUES ('2009/07/09', 'VND', CAST(1.00 AS Numeric(19, 2)), '0000')

table.name: HoaDon
table.script: CREATE TABLE [{0}] ( [MaHD] NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, [STT] BIGINT NOT NULL, [MaQuay] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [MaNV] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [TenNVBanHang] NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, [MaThue] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [MaPhieuTraHang] NVARCHAR(255), [TenKhachHang] NVARCHAR(255), [DienThoaiKhachHang] NVARCHAR(255), [NgayBatDau] DATETIME, [GioBatDau] INT, [NgayKetThuc] DATETIME, [GioKetThuc] INT, [CaBan] INT NOT NULL, [DaIn] BIT NOT NULL, [MaHDGoc] NVARCHAR(50), [MaHDShop] NVARCHAR(50), [MaTheKHTT] NVARCHAR(20), [TriGiaBan] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, [TienCK] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, [ThanhTienBan] NUMERIC (19, 2), [TienPhuThu] NUMERIC (19, 2), [LoaiHoaDon] INT NOT NULL, [TienTraKhach] NUMERIC (19, 2), [DaCapNhatTon] BIT, [DaKetChuyenCongNo] BIT, [DaVanChuyen] BIT, [ID] NVARCHAR(50), [TLCK1] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, [TLCK2] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL );

table.name: CTHoaDon
table.script: CREATE TABLE [{0}] ( [MaHD] NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [MaHH] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [STT] INT NOT NULL, [NgayGioQuet] DATETIME, [MaNccDM] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [SoLuong] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, [DGBan] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, [TriGiaBan] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, [TLCKGiamGia] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, [TienGiamGia] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, [TriGiaSauGiamGia] NUMERIC (19, 2), [TLCK_GioVang] NUMERIC (19, 2), [TienCK_GioVang] NUMERIC (19, 2), [TriGiaSauGioVang] NUMERIC (19, 2), [TLCKHD] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, [TienCKHD] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, [TriGiaSauCKHD] NUMERIC (19, 2), [TLCK_TheGiamGia] NUMERIC (19, 2), [TienCK_TheGiamGia] NUMERIC (19, 2), [ThanhTienBan] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, [TienPhuThu] NUMERIC (19, 2), [LoaiHangHoaBan] INT, [DaVanChuyen] BIT, [TenHH] NVARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY ([MaHD], [MaHH], [STT]) );

table.name: ThanhToanHoaDon
table.script: CREATE TABLE [{0}]( [MaHD] NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, [MaHinhThuc] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [MaNhomThanhToan] NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, [MaThe] NVARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, [ThanhTien] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, [TyGiaNgoaiTe] NUMERIC (19, 2), [ThanhTienQuiDoi] NUMERIC (19, 2) NOT NULL, [TLFee] NUMERIC (19, 2), [DaVanChuyen] BIT, [ChuThe] NVARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY ([MaHD], [MaHinhThuc]) );
